headline.main: YUGOSLAV REFUGEE WARNS ABOUT ITALY; Prof. Furlan Says Its Army Is 'Very Good' and That Axis Is Harmonious UNDER DEATH SENTENCE He Learns Here That Fascist Court Convicted Him in Plot That Began After He Left

lead_paragraph: Professor Boris Furlan, Yugoslav refugee in this country who is under sentence of death by an Italian military tribunal, warned yesterday that Italy had a "very good army" and that it was dangerous to ridicule or minimize its strength.
abstract: Yugoslav refugee Prof Furlan warns of Ital mil strength; describes own escape from Gers during Yugoslav campaign

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
